definitions.definition: in the same direction as the wind is blowing
positioned relative to something in such a way that it can be smelled in the wind
examples: I don't want to live downwind from a pig farm.

definitions.definition: in the direction opposite that of landing in a traffic pattern

main_definition: in the same direction as the wind is blowing
secondary_definitions: ( followed by from ) positioned relative to something in such a way that it can be smelled in the wind
( aviation ) in the direction opposite that of landing in a traffic pattern
